page.title: 13Life Style : A Typical Day
page.content: A day in the life of Sakina J.(11yrs) On a normal{school}day,I wake up at 7.30am.I get washed and dressed.Then I have my breakfast and leave the house at 8.30am for school.It takes me 15 min.We have a big assembly on Tuesdays where all the classes in the Juniors get together.After assembly we have maths then a 15 min break.I play "Kingy",which is a ball game.After the buzzer goes I go to prefect duty.At 12.00 we have our lunch break.I play Kingy,until 12.40 when I eat my packedlunch.I play for a little while and then I go in for more lessons.We have an afternoon play and we finish off work and I go home at 3.35pm. Sometimes if there's something special we go to the mosque where we do our prayers.When we come home I go straight to bed.
